name: Netgear WNDR3700 adminpage routerlogin.net
description:
A more modern style for the admin site of your router. 
This style is specific for the url http://www.routerlogin.net . Change the url to your ip if you are using that.
This style only works on Firefox because it has been split in 3 parts. You can strip the css if you like to make it work on Chrome.
